msg: * serfmake: add --with-gssapi option to build the kerberos auth module.

author: lgo
msg: Continue on the logging facilities. Log local and remote ip address:port for
socket-related events. Add a log function to enable constructing a log line
(log_time): function that logs current date&time, extracted from serf__log.
reset_connection, serf_connection_close): Use serf__log_skt to relate a
(socket_writev): Use serf__log_skt. Use serf__log_nopref to construct log

author: lgo
msg: In test/serf_get.c: print the complete certificate in readable form.
Used some code from the Subversion project.
(print_certs): print all components of the certificate.
